metadata.Title: CVE-2011-3481 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description:
The index_get_ids function in index.c in imapd in Cyrus IMAP Server before2.4.11, when server-side threading is enabled, allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and daemon crash) via acrafted References header in an e-mail message.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2011-3481` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cyrus-admin - 2.4.12-2
cyrus-admin-2.2 - 2.4.12-2
cyrus-admin-2.4 - 2.4.12-2
cyrus-clients - 2.4.12-2
cyrus-clients-2.2 - 2.4.12-2
cyrus-clients-2.4 - 2.4.12-2
cyrus-common - 2.4.12-2
cyrus-common-2.2 - 2.4.12-2
cyrus-common-2.4 - 2.4.12-2
cyrus-imapd - 2.4.12-2
cyrus-imapd-2.2 - 2.4.12-2
cyrus-imapd-2.4 - 2.4.12-2
cyrus-murder - 2.4.12-2
cyrus-murder-2.2 - 2.4.12-2
cyrus-murder-2.4 - 2.4.12-2
cyrus-nntpd - 2.4.12-2
cyrus-nntpd-2.2 - 2.4.12-2
cyrus-nntpd-2.4 - 2.4.12-2
cyrus-pop3d - 2.4.12-2
cyrus-pop3d-2.2 - 2.4.12-2
cyrus-pop3d-2.4 - 2.4.12-2
cyrus-replication - 2.4.12-2
cyrus-replication-2.4 - 2.4.12-2
libcyrus-imap-perl - 2.4.12-2
libcyrus-imap-perl22 - 2.4.12-2
libcyrus-imap-perl24 - 2.4.12-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cyrus-imapd-2.4 package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.4.12-2').
